document_data.name: Old Gebe
document_data.History: ''Circa'' the {{YearlinkName|1368}}, during the spring festivals in [[Dlusk]], Old Gebe give free hayrides to children and told stories and sang songs about [[mule]]s, including his own, [[Sara]] and [[Corey]]. He knew much of local gossip, legends, and was knowledgeable on the subject of the [[Unapproachable East]] in general.
